name: tree-viewer
description: Demonstrate your knowledge of several technologies, including databases, backend design, and UI/UX by creating a live-updating tree view as a web application. ## Dependencies * body-parser * dotenv * express * express-handlebars * mysql ## Installation ### Install Locally ``` git clone  npm install ``` ### Setup Database ``` mysql -u <Your MySQL Username> -p <Your MySQL Password> \. \db\schema.sql \. \db\seeds.sql \q ``` ### .env File 1.
